mapper.insert: insert into userapp_regist ( username, password, RId, Rphone, identity, status, registTime, updateTime ) values ( #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
